name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-strategic-analysis-o3
title: Strategic Analysis Prompt
shortDescription: This prompt utilizes the power of the o3 model to performe a strategic analysis of your business.
longDescription: This prompt utilizes the power of the o3 model to performe a strategic analysis of your business. It takes into account sales data, demographics, customer reviews, financial reports, operational data and market demographics in the analysis.

metadata.value: Develop a SMART goal-setting framework based on these long-term objectives and desired outcomes [text]
